item.title: ContactField: Implicit Field Representation for Multi-Person Interaction Geometry
item.description: Novel implicit field representation accurately reconstructs multi-person interaction geometry in 3D, simultaneously capturing occupancy, instance IDs, and contact fields, surpassing existing methods.

item.title: KOALA: Empirical Lessons Toward Memory-Efficient and Fast Diffusion Models for Text-to-Image Synthesis
item.description: KOALA: New efficient text-to-image diffusion models achieving 4x speed and 69% size reduction of SDXL, generating 1024px images on consumer GPUs with 8GB VRAM.
